QuantityOrigCurrObject.description: A common pair of pricing components, where there is an 'original' (e.g gross quantity before adjustments) and a 'current' (latest at point in time after any adjustments up to that time)

IsChanged.description: Has the original changed compared to the current for this quantity pair

Original.description: The original quantity BEFORE any adjustments

Current.description: The current (relative to the time of the event) quantity AFTER any adjustments
